\w When|strong="H3615"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w finished|strong="H3615"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w royal|strong="H4428"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w*, \w successfully|strong="H6743"\w* carrying \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* own \w palace|strong="H1004"\w*,
